It was just another day around Capsule Corporation, or so it seemed, as Bulma Briefs drove towards her home from work. {Man, what a hard day...can't believe they held me over, I'm soo hungry...} Just then, as if by her thoughts, she saw a man on the curb with a stand of fruits. {Hm...I could go for something to eat...but only fruits, I gotta watch my figure or Veggie will probably hate me..} So, she parked her Capsule Hover near the curbside, got out, and walked up to the rather dirty looking man near the fruit stand. "Excuse me..do you run this fruit stand?" She asked politely. He smiled at her, his teeth practically rotting out of his mouth. "Why yes..yes I do, are you interested in something to eat Ms...?" "Briefs." "Ms. Briefs?" "Actually.." she looked over what he had, all of the food looking delicious. "I could go for something sweet...how about this?" She picked up a very large, sweet smelling pear. He nodded, "Ahh..yes..very good for those with a sweet tooth." "Right..so how much?" He waved a hand dismisivly. "It's on the house...just don't eat it too quickly." "What could possibly happen?" She said, with a chuckle. "But thanks, anywho for the free fruit." "It's not a problem, Ms. Briefs..." she started to walk away, and he said under his breath, "Anything to help you become a pear.." He smirked, and he and the fruit stand disappeared as a car passed by...
Bulma hopped into the car, and started driving home, as she bit into the pear. {My Kami! This is great! It's like a candy bar...wow..} In no more than a minute, the entire thing was gone, only the core being left over, and that wsa even in halves. Bulma burped, and patted her stomach. "Aaahh...that hits the spot.." She said to herself. She shifted in the seat of the car, it seeming slightly uncomfortable for some reason. "Huh...leather must've expanded from the heat.." She shrugged, and stopped the car right infront of her house. As she went to get out of the car, she noticed her legs were just barely missing the steering wheel. {Did it lower itself somehow?...} She frowned, and tried to push the steering wheel up. To her astonishment, it was as high as it could go. {Must be a trick of the light...} She shook her head, and got out of the capsule car. She started to walk into the house, noticing that for some reason, something kept brushing against her thighs. She frowned, looked down, and gasped. Her thighs had become quite large, now rubbing against each other inside her too small skirt. {What the?..What's..going on?} She fumbled with the keys, and opened the door up. She walked into the deserted house, "Good..no one's home.." She shut the door behind her, only to feel it hit her on the rear! "What in the.." {I've never done that before..} She looked behind herself to see that her butt had expanded into a rather large shelf! The door had hit her rear, as it was slightly inside the doorway. Bulma looked like she had seen a ghost. She turned around, and shut the door proper, locking it. She walked over to a mirror, and turned sideways, shocked to see what she did. Her rear had distended away from the small of her back, indeed giving her about a 2 inch shelf where it just jutted out. She put a hand on her rear, just to make sure it was actually there not a trick from the lighting. Sure enough, it was her butt, she could feel her hand resting on it. And to top it off, it was really soft, almost like dough. {My word..am I getting fat!?} She turned and faced the mirror at the front, to see her hips were also abit larger. Possibly 2 inches on each side. "Oh my God..." And her thighs were also bigger, it hadn't just been the lighting outside. She poked her thigh, her finger going in abit. "I am getting fat..and bottom heavy at that...Kami, what's Vegeta going to think? Or the kids?..." Just then, she heard the door downstairs open...

"Damn why is 18 so uncooperative?" grumbled the frustrated Dr Gero.

Going over 18's blueprints, the insidious scientist was unable to ascertain the female android's peculiar anomaly. For reasons unknown, the female android possessed an unquenchable hunger. From the moment she was activated, 18 desired copious amounts of food, and became temperamental when denied access to nourishment. It baffled the red ribbon scientist, 18's body was that of a beautiful, slender, healthy woman who shouldn't wield such voracity.

"I'll have to run a few tests." Gero stated awakening 18 from her chamber.

Gero pushed a few buttons and 18 was freed from her chamber. The svelte android stepped out and stared at the apprehensive scientist.

"18 I'll have to run a few tests, if you cooperate you'll get a tasty dinner."

18 remained silent but continued staring at Gero.

"Now 18 if you'll just.." before finishing his instructions, Gero was cut down by 18.

"Ugh did that dirty old man really think that I'd put up with his ridiculous tests? He probably just wanted to fondle my body. Hmmph!" 18 sneered.

After her snarky remarked, 18 caught sight of the refrigerator. "Mmmmm" 18 hummed approaching the fridge with a content look on her face.

However upon opening the door, 18 found a disappointing sight. "Is this it?" she groaned seeing only a half full fridge.

"Lame. But I guess it'll do for now."

18 emptied out the fridge, stuffing herself with every last morsel. "Figures that old coot wouldn't have enough food for a woman. Guess I'll have to go find more food."

18 than resolved to leave the lab to venture out in the world in search of food. Before she left she looked at 17 and 16 and contemplated bringing them along.

Deep within the galaxy, there was an impressive spaceship that was hidden in a planet’s rings; making it hard to be detected. Inside the ship was numerous masked pirates that were carrying loot and doing several tasks. As they worked, loud heavy footsteps could be heard approaching the hard workers.

“What’s the hold -URP- up?! Where’s my dinner?!” came a loud commanding voice with a couple of shrieking burps.

There coming through the open-door way was a long, but messy curly orange hair, bluish skin woman who looked like she weighed at least 500 pounds. While generally big everywhere from her breasts, belly, and ass, most of her weight seemed to be in thunderous mighty thighs. She wore an open stained white jacket, concealing her bare breasts slightly that allowed her large blue belly to hang loose. Along with pants with gold buckles, a gold pointed necklace and earrings, black pull-on sleeves and a ripped damp purple sash. She wore no shoes, allowing her chubby feet freedom with no caged boots.

“S-Sorry, Captain Zangya,” one of the pirate workers said in a trembling voice. “We… We were trying to finish our given tasks but-”

Before he could finish his words, Zangya immediately flew into the man and sent him flying into the wall with her gut; leaving him stuck there like paste. The rest of the crew gasped and started to sweat nervously at their overweight captain.

“I don’t care if you’re cleaning the pipes when I say I’m hungry, then I want some bloody food!” Zangya yelled, spitting her drool out in fury.

“Well, I was hoping you join this amazing tournament that’s filled with loud and proud warriors such as yourself,” Vados explained as she pulled out a cookie from her staff to nibble on.

“Hah! A tournament? Why the hell would I care about some stupid tournament?” Zangya laughed, clearly not interested.

“Oh? But you should. Whichever team wins, they will be happily rewarded…” Vados finished with an evil grin.

Zangya’s eyes lit up from hearing the words, ‘rewarded’, making the space pirate rethink what she had just said. “Now why didn’t you say so…?”

Appointing one of her workers as the temp captain, Zangya held onto Vados who beamed her off the ship and headed straight back Lord Champa’s planet.

Vados only needed one more person to join her team. Who could the last person be...?
